info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of customer documents and images.
info.title: Party Customers Documents APIs

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

get.summary: Retrieves the list of image records for specific id

parameters.name: imageReference
parameters.description: The reference of the image

parameters.name: imageApplication
parameters.description: This field is used to link an image to a T24 application or file.

parameters.name: imageType
parameters.description: Identifies the type of image to be stored and its location. Typical usage would be to segregate images by criteria such as PASSPORTS, PHOTOGRAPHS, SIGNATURES and DOCUMENTS. Image types can be used to assist selection of records in Enquiries as well as the physical distribution of files.Must be a valid record on IM.IMAGE.TYPE.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

imageId.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

imageType.description: Indicates the internal classification of images - such as Photographs, Documents, Passports, etc..,

imageApplication.description: Indicates the domain name (technical identifier) the image/document is attached to. E.g., Customer, Payments, Loans, Deposits, etc..,

companyMnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch related to the image record

imageReference.description: Indicates the reference no. E.g. contract no./customer no./payments no. to which the image/document is attached to

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

fileName.description: Identifies the image stored on the client PC or on a PC network file system

imagePath.description: Identifies the image stored on the file system, specifically based on the logo url mentioned in open banking directory.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

imageType.description: Indicates the internal classification of images - such as Photographs, Documents, Passports, etc..,

imageApplication.description: Indicates the domain name (technical identifier) the image/document is attached to. E.g., Customer, Payments, Loans, Deposits, etc..,

companyMnemonic.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch related to the image record

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

mediaType.description: Indicates the social media type, as defined by the institution e.g. - FACEBOOK - LINKEDIN - MOBILE - TWITTER

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

options.description: The usable options for the override

The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

customerDocumentId.description: Defines the identifier for the customer document

documentName.description: Specifies the name of the document

referenceNumber.description: Specifies the Reference for the document, if any

statusName.description: An institution-defined high level description or segmentation of the customer

statusDate.description: Specifies the Date from which the status applies to the document

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

documentSequence.description: Specifies the sequence number of a document, to distinguish a new document obtained on expiry of the original one

lastUpdateDate.description: Identifies the date of last update to the record

documentNature.description: Specifies the nature of the document, which can possibly take values like DUPLICATE,ORIGINAL etc

referenceNumber.description: Specifies the Reference for the document, if any

statusDate.description: Specifies the Date from which the status applies to the document

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

documentSequence.description: Specifies the sequence number of a document, to distinguish a new document obtained on expiry of the original one

documentNature.description: Specifies the nature of the document, which can possibly take values like DUPLICATE,ORIGINAL etc

referenceNumber.description: Specifies the Reference for the document, if any

statusDate.description: Specifies the Date from which the status applies to the document

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

documentSequence.description: Specifies the sequence number of a document, to distinguish a new document obtained on expiry of the original one

documentNature.description: Specifies the nature of the document, which can possibly take values like DUPLICATE,ORIGINAL etc

description.description: The name used for display purposes

imageType.description: Identifies the type of image to be stored and its location. Typical usage would be to segregate images by criteria such as PASSPORTS, PHOTOGRAPHS, SIGNATURES and DOCUMENTS. Image types can be used to assist selection of records in Enquiries as well as the physical distribution of files.Must be a valid record on IM.IMAGE.TYPE.

imageApplication.description: This field is used to link an image to a T24 application or file.

companyMnemonic.description: Shortened identiifier for a company. 3 alphanumer characters, e.g. BNK, BN1, BN2

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

imagePath.description: Identifies the image stored on the file system.

description.description: The name used for display purposes

imageType.description: Identifies the type of image to be stored and its location. Typical usage would be to segregate images by criteria such as PASSPORTS, PHOTOGRAPHS, SIGNATURES and DOCUMENTS. Image types can be used to assist selection of records in Enquiries as well as the physical distribution of files.Must be a valid record on IM.IMAGE.TYPE.

uploadId.description: The unique ID of the uploaded file

imageContent.description: Specifies base64 encoded string of documents which can be decoded in client side to view or download documents,

uploadId.description: The unique ID of the uploaded file
